content: yo p1 repeat from * to end round 2 *p1 k3 p2 k3 p1 repeat from * to end round 3 as round 1 rnds 4 - 8 as round 2 round 9 *p1 yo s2kpo yo p2 k3 p1 repeat from * to end rnds 10 - 14 as round 2 heel flap heel flap is worked flat over the sts between the borm and ma set-up row ws sl1 wyif p16 p2tog p16 turn work 34 sts left row 1 rs *sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to end row 2 ws sl1 wyif p 33 repeat row 1 and 2 16 times more ending with a ws row turn work so that rs is facing you proceed to heel turn heel turn row 1 rs sl1 wyib k18 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws sl1 wyif p5 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 sl1 wyib k to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn work row 4 sl1 wyif p to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn work work row 3 and 4 back and forth until all side stitches have been worked you should end up with 20 sts next row rs knit across all heel sts place borm gusset set-up round resume working in the round pick up and knit 17 sts along the left side of the heel flap place ma work 35 instep sts following chart a after working leg repeat for 3 times work last 5 sts of chart or written instructions for instep below place mb pick up and knit 17 sts along the other side of the heel flap knit to borm you now have a total of 89 sts on the needle 54 sts between mb and ma the gusset decreases are worked on sts just before ma and right after mb every other round as follows round 1 decrease round k to 2 sts before ma k2tog sma work instep sts according to chart a or written instructions smb ssk k to borm round 2 k to ma sma work instep sts according to chart a or written instructions smb k to borm © laurelknits oy 2021 3 #yolandasocks repeat rnds 1 and 2 until there are 36 sts left between mb and ma on next decrease round work a decrease only before ma you now have 35 sts between mb and ma and a total of 70 sts on the needle remove borm as from now on ma will be the new borm written instructions for chart a instep round 1 *p1 k3 p2 yo s2kpo yo p1 repeat from * 2 more times p1 k3 p1 round 2 *p1 k3 p2 k3 p1 repeat from * 2 more times p1 k3 p1 round 3 as round 1 rnds 4 - 8 as round 2 round 9 *p1 yo s2kpo yo p2 k3 p1 repeat from * 2 more times p1 yo s2kpo yo p1 rnds 10 - 14 as round 2 foot
